description.en: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.ar: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.br: Uma mística aura de Raio aparecerá em seu personagem. Dura 15 dias.
description.cns: 你的角色身上将会出现神秘的闪电光影特效。持续15天。
description.de: Eine mystische Blitzaura umgibt deinen Charakter. Hält 15 Tage.
description.fi: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.fil: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.fr: Entoure votre personnage d'une aura mystique d'éclairs pendant 15 jours.
description.id: Aura Petir mistis akan muncul pada karakter Anda. Berlangsung selama 15 hari.
description.it: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.jp: 15日間、神秘的な稲妻のオーラがキャラクターに現れます。
description.kr: 당신의 캐릭터에 신비로운 라이트닝 아우라가 나타납니다. 15일간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.pl: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.ru: A mystical Lightning aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.sp: Una mística aura de Relámpago aparecerá en tu personaje. Dura 15 días.

description.th: ออร่าสายฟ้าลึกลับจะปรากฏขึ้นบนตัวละครของคุณ เวลา 15 วัน
description.tw: 神秘的雷電光輝圍繞在你身旁，持續15天
description.vi: Một hào quang Lightning thần bí sẽ xuất hiện trên nhân vật của bạn. Kéo dài 15 ngày.
